subject: Baseball
Snow and Snowstorms
lead_paragraph: Thanks to the efforts of the Rockies’ grounds crew and others including a costumed mascot, the Mets and Rockies were able to play, free of snow if not close-to-freezing temperatures.
snippet: Thanks to the efforts of the Rockies’ grounds crew and others including a costumed mascot, the Mets and Rockies were able to play, free of snow if not close-to-freezing temperatures.
